title: Electrostatic interaction bridges charge transport kinetics and high-temperature capacitive energy storage of polymer dielectrics
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02371D, Review Article
Minhao Yang, Yanlong Zhao, Huarui Yan, Zepeng Wang, Chao Xu, Chong Zhang, Emiliano Bilotti, Jianying Li, Zhi-Min Dang
The capacitive energy storage of polymer dielectrics degrades rapidly at elevated temperatures and electric fields owing to the exponential growth of conduction loss. The formation of conduction loss is mainly...
